manifest.__chart: The logo must stay an archangel emblem and the application name, SAVEme
manifest.one: Any participant should adopt the SAVEme protocols to be compatible and to not initiate a trench war that may degrade the service
manifest.two: This application do not collect any information or record any of them provided by the user in a public database
manifest.three: The archangel phone number must be hardcoded in the application
manifest.four: The user must respect the use of the SAVEme signaling
